channel.title: Adding new Environment models
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm wondering if there's a way to edit the games object model cache? I wan't to change a few things around mainly to add custom trees. Could someone point me as to where to start? I've already added this on the client side in Objects.xml:
[code] <object name="Old Tree" type="1275" description="It's a tree. And by how it's standing, it looks pretty old."> </object>[/code]
Now I need to work out where and how to add my Dat model, then how to map it to the id 1275.
If someone could help me it would be amazing.
~ Alex

item.title: Adding new Environment models
item.dc:creator: @alexc95 alexc95
item.description:
@alexc95 wrote:

Hi,

I’m wondering if there’s a way to edit the games object model cache? I wan’t to change a few things around mainly to add custom trees. Could someone point me as to where to start? I’ve already added this on the client side in Objects.xml:

<object name="Old Tree" type="1275" description="It's a tree. And by how it's standing, it looks pretty old."> </object>

Now I need to work out where and how to add my Dat model, then how to map it to the id 1275.

If someone could help me it would be amazing.
